description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Go on a pooping spree as a vengeful, fat pigeon!  This twin-stick poop'em up comes with a big load of famous pristine landmarks, a hot pile of squishy trophies and an online top droppers highscore list!  You are the messenger of the Poopocalypse!
description.short: Go on a pooping spree as a vengeful, fat pigeon!  This twin-stick poop'em up comes with a big load of famous pristine landmarks, a hot pile of squishy trophies and an online top droppers highscore list!  You are the messenger of the Poopocalypse!
